reflection::user_type::hierarchy_traverser

reflection::user_type::hierarchy_traverser Struct Reference

Implement this interface to traverse hierarchy of types. More...

virtual bool EnterType (const user_type &t, size_t depth)=0

virtual void LeaveType (const user_type &t, size_t depth)=0
 called when leaving a type, not called if EnterType returned false

Detailed Description

Implement this interface to traverse hierarchy of types.

Traversal starts from the node traverse was invoked on and continues for all ancestors of that type
